text: The 20th season of Doctor Who began on 3 January 1983. It started with the story Arc of Infinity. On 16 March 1983, The King's Demons became the last episode of the season. The 20th Anniversary special, "The Five Doctors", was in November 1983. John Nathan-Turner produced this season. Eric Saward edited its script. == References == ===Bibliography=== * Category:1983 in British television Category:Doctor Who
title: Doctor Who season 20
